name: SURVIVORS LEFT: X
description:
So this is my first game. My therapist suggest me to find something i care about in life. I cannot find anything so i just make this. Im still learning and want you to have at least 1-2 may be even 3 good engaging sessions. What to expect : crabo, puzzle levels, pacing levels, boss fights, humor attemts, achievments, records. And it ll be cool if you contact me about anything -


  • Kill your time - dont kill survivors.
  • Make you "feel" like a person pressing buttions on a keyboard.
  • Noone read this sec anyway!
  • Buy
  • Buy
  • Buy
  • Help my mom become proud of me
  • Good luck & Have fun.
